archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.2a: a) meet an agreed specification of the types of devices allowed (e.g. the manufacturer and model of the device, the operating system and security features required, such as PIN or password enforcement, biometric authentication and device encryption)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
